title: Multi-User Cryo-Ultramicrotome for High Resolution and Immuno-Gold Analysis at UEA
abstractText: Abstracts are not currently available in GtR for all funded research. This is normally because the abstract was not required at the time of proposal submission, but may be because it included sensitive information such as personal details.
impactText: The REI awarded cryo-ultramicrotome has underpined key research supported by the BBSRC and others by enabling efficient ultra-thin sectioning for high resolution structural analyses and by providing a cryo-sectioning facility for immuno-electron microscope localisation of molecules vital for several studies in the School of Biological Sciences at UEA as well as at JIC. findingsText: The cryo-ultramicrotome obtained on the equipment grant was essential for much of the work carried out in my lab. Electron microscopy is an essential part of several of our published data.
